snippet.title: The S Factor: Sonia & Silver (2013 Edition) | How to Play as Scourge & The Warp Zone
snippet.description:
So originally (and might still do it), I was going to do a run with all characters, and never really knew how to play as Scourge since he isn't available on this version through character select. However few months ago, I was playing around with a few options & just so happen to find this! Not only that, but this Warp Zone through act 2 came unexpected, first time i've really seen this, and it's unique.

Here's how to get Scourge:
Go to options, go through the menu themes and find Double. Go back to title screen, activate the level select to whatever level you choose & done.

As far as the Warp Zone, once reaching nearby the end of Spectra Valley act 2, with enough speed, try to jump over a spring & you should be good. 

Zone 2 brings you to Arid Temple.
Zone 3 bring you to Ring Land.
Zone 4 brings you to Placid Sapphire.

Link is here!
By Aquaslash & Pals:
http://info.sonicretro.org/The_S_Factor:_Sonia_and_Silver
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
#Jaypin88 #SapphireSquad 💎
Thanks for watching! Be sure to hit the like button, share amongst others, most certainly subscribe, and hit the bell to be notified when new video's come out!
